item.title: Resources
item.description: Websites RE subreddit Formal Program Analysis Reading Veteransec Cybersecurity Community | Blog Posts and Other Writeups Buffer Overflow Tutorials HackerNews

item.title: Learn Through Doing
item.description: Tools IDA Freeware - Old version of commerical-grade dissassembler and debugger. Learn More Radare2 - Powerful dissassembler and debugger. CLI only, has some GUI extensions though. Online Compiler - Tool used in class to quickly demonstrate various compilations of C and C++ code. NSA Reversing Tool (GHIDRA) - Announcement of new government used tool for reversing. More Info - Reddit thread discussing this announcement. Free Online Dissassembler Binary Exploitation Please be very careful as to where you are performing such exploits.

item.title: Respected Professionals
item.description: Twitter C-Level Mark Rogers Head of Security Operations at DEFCON VP Cybersecurity Strategy for Okta Geoff Belknap CSO of Slack Michael Coates Head of security at Mozilla Former CISO of Twitter Journalism Eric Geller Cybersecurity reporter at @politico Zack Whittaker Security editor, @TechCrunch Named Amit Serper Head of security research @cybereason Nocturnus Matt Blaze “Scientist, safecracker, professor, writer.
